comments:
20040303

When I did a Synchronize with Repository with from a project in the package 
view I got the following exception.

Note that you can open the view from the view menu no problem.

!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 03, 2004 15:59:52.944
!MESSAGE java.lang.ClassCastException

Created an attachment (id=8322)
Log file

I found similar exceptions in my log after opening sync view with I20040303

The case in comment #2 has already been fixed (i.e. it is a ClassNotFound 
problem that was caused by a bug in the plugin.xml)

The case in comment #1 indicates that the view with the sync view ID is not 
the sync view (i.e. cannot be cast to ISynchronizeView). This indicates either 
a mixup in class loading or view retrieval but without a reproduceable case 
it's impossible to say.

The best I can do is catch the class cast and log what I can.
*** Bug 54084 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Code has been added to catch the class cast and log a bit more info.
